licence_overview:
If you plan to impound (store) water (eg by using a dam or weir) in England and Wales, you need an Impoundment Licence from the [Environment Agency.](http://www.environment-agency.gov.uk/ "Environment Agency"){:rel="external"} 

You will also need permission if you want to alter or remove existing impounding works.
licence_short_description: Licence to impound water (eg by using a dam or weir) in England and Wales.
overview: You need a licence to impound water in England and Wales
title: Impoundment licence (England & Wales)
